Title: 13 Assassins
Writer: Kaneo Ikegami (based on a screenplay by), Shoichirou Ikemiya (story), Daisuke Tengan (screenplay)
Actors: Kôji Yakusho, Takayuki Yamada, Yûsuke Iseya, Ikki Sawamura
Plot: A group of assassins come together for a suicide mission to kill an evil lord.
Production: TV Asahi, Recorded Picture Company (RPC), Dentsu, Asahi Broadcasting Corporation, Toho Company Ltd.
